title: Can't Reconnect To Game In Progress, Happened 3 times now.
body: I've been trying to play league for the past 2 days, having issues where it would say incorrect log in info, but I have the correct info, and recently its been having issues where I would get out of champ select, then it would tell me to reconnect, but when I clicked the button, nothing happens. Its very annoying because i'm probably going to get leaverbuster....

replies.body:
Most of the time those reconnect issues can be a sign that something is blocking your network from being able to reach the game servers. It might feel a little redundant, but let's make sure to adjust some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case. 

If that's still not working, I know some other players have been able to get back in by closing their client and restarting it. It's sounds a little odd, but hey, whatever works right!
